video_prompt: **Prompt:** Character's white hair gently sways, reflecting soft light. His serene expression shifts subtly, eyes darting right. Fabric ruffles and gems faintly sparkle, while a prominent pocket watch chain subtly oscillates. Background gears slowly turn, casting dim, shifting glimmers.
image_prompt: Anime portrait of a serene male character with long white hair and light blue eyes, fair skin, looking slightly right. He wears an elaborate, light-colored, ruffled, high-necked garment with lace-like patterns, a prominent purple/blue gem brooch with silver/platinum metalwork, dangling blue/clear gem earrings, and a detailed pocket watch on a chain. Dark, ornate background features clockwork/machinery elements. Soft lighting with subtle glow. Anime style, digital painting.
refined_video_prompt: Hair gently sways. The character's expression subtly shifts as eyes dart right. Fabric ruffles and gems faintly sparkle. A chain softly oscillates. In the background, gears slowly turn, casting dim, shifting glimmers.
